 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵ֫קֶב‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==consequence==, usually as **adverb accusative** ==as a consequence of, because== (that) also ==reward, end== (see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקַב‎</span>; and cf, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***heel*** figurative consequence, result); — 

**1.** [[Isa.5.23|Isa 5:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצְדִּיקֵי רָשָׁע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵקֶב שֹׁחַד‎</span> (adverb accusative) ***in consequence of*** a bribe. [[Ps.40.16|Ps 40:16]] (= [[Ps.70.4|Ps 70:4]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על עֵקֶב בָּשְׁתָּם‎</span> (pleon.) ***according to the consequence of*** their shame, i.e. ***in consequence of*** the disgrace falling upon them. Hence as **conjunction** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵקֶב אֲשֶׁר‎</span> ***as a consequence of*** (the fact) ***that, because***, [[Gen.22.18|Gen 22:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר שָׁמַעְתָּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּקֹלִי ע‎</span> [[Gen.26.5|Gen 26:5]]; [[2Sam.12.6|2Sam 12:6]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵקֶב כִּי‎</span> [[2Sam.12.10|2Sam 12:10]]; [[Amos.4.12|Amos 4:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי זאת אעשׂה לך‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵקֶב‎</span> alone, [[Num.14.24|Num 14:24]], and (followed by imperfect) [[Deut.7.12|Deut 7:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תשׁמעון‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> ***in consequence of*** your hearkening, etc., [[Deut.8.20|Deut 8:20]]. 

**2.** ***consequence*** = ***gain, reward***, [[Ps.19.12|Ps 19:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשָׁמְרָם עֵקֶב רָב‎</span>, [[Prov.22.4|Prov 22:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֶׁר וגו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵקֶב עֲנָוָה (וְ)יִרְאַת י‎</span>. 

**3.** ***end*** (of time), adverb accusative, [[Ps.119.33|Ps 119:33]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶצֳּרֶנָּה ע‎</span> ***to the end***, v[[Ps.119.112|Ps 119:112]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעוֺלָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (compare [[Eccl.16.3|Eccl 16:3]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִקְבָּא‎</span> (rare)).
